alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit; Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 16 at 3:36AM HST until July 16 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF MAUI COUNTY AND THE BIG ISLAND... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...East to southeast winds increasing to 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Big Island summits of Mauna Loa and Mauna Kea, as well as the Haleakala Summit on Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
